td.content: s:74 yr old white female retired presents with progressive Mental Health for past 2 weeks. o:Height 173 cm, Weight 64 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 86, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 17 a:Schizophrenia p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to psychiatry.
